clinical_study.brief_title: Use of Adjustable Gastric Band in Adolescents
clinical_study.official_title: Use of the REALIZE™ Adjustable Gastric Band (Model 2200-X) in Adolescents

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to investigate the use the adjustable gastric band for the treatment of obesity in adolescents.

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.description: Reduction in percent of excess weight loss (%EWL).
